title: Search for business training and networking events

details.description: Find local business support, training events, networking events and seminars in England, Wales, Scotland and Northern Ireland
details.body:
Use the Event Finder to search for local events in your area run by a variety of organisations.

You can search by:

  • location
  • sector and type of event

England

Events Finder

Scotland

Events Finder

Wales

Events Finder

Northern Ireland

Events Finder
details.alternative_title: Find business events in your area

details.description: Includes Self Assessment, self-employment and starting a business
Information about starting up and running a business in the UK, including help if you're self employed or a sole trader.

related.title: Set up as a sole trader

details.description: Register as a sole trader with HM Revenue & Customs and legal responsibilities if you run a business as a self-employed sole trader
Training for different business sectors is developed by sector skills councils. Search the Sector Skills Councils Alliance website for courses and qualifications.
